segments.text: Well , to come straight to the point , could you tell us something about your new price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most willingly . It's 600 dollars per ton .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you know , the price of this article has soared up since last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But I must say it's still unacceptable . Couldn't you make a discount for me ? You see , we have such a long-term cooperation . And our business could be mutually beneficial .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I can make a special offer for you . This price is based on careful calculations . And it is the lowest price we can offer to you .
segments.speaker: S2
